TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ResourceProviderFactory extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Serves as the base class for classes that create resource providers.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory> is an abstract class that serves as the base class for objects that return global and local resource providers. Classes must derive from <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory> to implement its functionality.
## Examples The following code example shows a customized resource provider factory that retrieves cached values.
[!code-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks An instance of an abstract class cannot be created. Classes that derive from <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory> can implement a constructor to set any default values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.Compilation.IResourceProvider CreateGlobalResourceProvider(string classKey) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the resource class.
Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, creates a global resource provider.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When overridden in a derived class, this method returns an <xref:System.Web.Compilation.IResourceProvider> object for the given `classKey` parameter. The method could be implemented such that `classKey` is the name of a .resx file in the App_GlobalResources folder.
## Examples The following code example shows a customized resource provider factory that implements the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory.CreateGlobalResourceProvider%2A> method and retrieves cached values.
[!code-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.Compilation.IResourceProvider CreateLocalResourceProvider(string virtualPath) cil managed

Docs.param: The path to a resource file.
Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, creates a local resource provider.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When overridden in a derived class, this method returns an <xref:System.Web.Compilation.IResourceProvider> object for the given `virtualPath` parameter. The method could be implemented such that `virtualPath` maps to a resource file.
## Examples The following code example shows a customized resource provider factory that implements the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory.CreateLocalResourceProvider%2A> method and retrieves cached values.
[!code-csharp[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Compilation.ResourceProviderFactory/VB/source.vb#2)]
